::Squizzy::

She looked at the bots for a few more moments.  She then slowly 
climbed out of the pod and stood next to it, looking around curiously.

She wasn't sure what was going on.  Some of her prgramming circuits 
were still damaged.  She didn't know what faction she was or what she 
was supposed to do.  She took a few causious steps away from the 
pod.  She walked away from the bots and looked at teh landscape that 
surrounded her.  She then turned to face the two bots.
"Where am I?"
